page.title: 10MODERN TECH/NEW DEVELOPMENT
page.content:
Today's idea of modern technology is usually linked with computers in some form. The IBM company has its main offices based in Chiswick. Most of the hardware they deal with is in the form of mainframe computers. A visit to the building gives you a chance to compare the school's micros with the machines there.
Not only are there developments in technology but also in the leisure industry. A new leisure complex is being constructed on the site of the old Brentford open market. It is scheduled to be completed some time in 1986. The complex will have the usual facilities, eg:- various courts, gyms and swimming pools. Such a facility has been lacking in this area and the whole community will benefit greatly from it.
